text: Dughiar kamɨn gumazir kurar mam iti, an ziam Seba. A Bikrin otarim, a Benjaminɨn anabamɨn gumazir mam. Egha Seba sɨgham givia dɨa ghaze, “Devit markɨ, e an anabamɨn gumazamiziba puvatɨ. E Jesin otarimɨn adarazi puvatɨ, e an gɨn mangan kogham. Aria, e Israelian gumazamiziba uamategh uan nguibabar mangam.”
